verses.verse: Not to us, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> not to us, But to Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H9202>glory<s%> <S%H5921>Because<s%> of Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of Thy <S%H571>truth.<s%>
But our <S%H430>God<s%> is in the <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> He <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> He <S%H2654>pleases.<s%>
Their <S%H6091>idols<s%> are <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> The <S%H4639>work<s%> of man's <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
They have <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> but they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H1696>speak;<s%> They have <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> but they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H7200>see;<s%>
They have <S%H241>ears,<s%> but they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H8085>hear;<s%> They have <S%H639>noses,<s%> but they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H9552>smell;<s%>

They have <S%H3027>hands,<s%> but they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H4184>feel;<s%> They have <S%H7272>feet,<s%> but they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H1980>walk;<s%> They <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H1897>make<s%> a <S%H1897>sound<s%> with their <S%H1627>throat.<s%>
Those who <S%H6213>make<s%> them will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> them, <S%H3605>Everyone<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H982>trusts<s%> in them.
O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> He is their <S%H5828>help<s%> and their <S%H4043>shield.<s%>
O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> He is their <S%H5828>help<s%> and their <S%H4043>shield.<s%>
You who <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> He is their <S%H5828>help<s%> and their <S%H4043>shield.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H2142>been<s%> <S%H2142>mindful<s%> of us; He will <S%H1288>bless<s%> [us]; He will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> He will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>
He will <S%H1288>bless<s%> those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> The <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H5973>together<s%> with the <S%H1419>great.<s%>
May the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3254>give<s%> you <S%H3254>increase,<s%> You and your <S%H1121>children.<s%>
May you be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H6213>Maker<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth.<s%>
The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> But the <S%H776>earth<s%> He has <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
The <S%H4191>dead<s%> do not <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> [do] <S%H3605>any<s%> who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H1745>silence;<s%>
But as for us, we will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord<s%> From <S%H6258>this<s%> <S%H6258>time<s%> forth and <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord!<s%>
